name: RemoveItemFromPortfolio
description:
Remove an item from a portfolio in Asana.

Use this tool to remove an item from a specified portfolio in Asana. Requires the 'portfolios:write' scope.

parameters.name: portfolio_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio to remove the item from.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

parameters.name: item_to_remove
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the item to be removed from the portfolio.

value_schema.description: The item to remove from the portfolio.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable this to receive the response in a readable, formatted way. This can increase response size and is best for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: portfolio_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

parameters.name: data.item
parameters.description: The item to remove from the portfolio.

value_schema.description: The item to remove from the portfolio.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
